metadata.synopsis: Back up line after Mol has vouched for the player and is running back to last light in to play a game of lanceboard with raphael.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Mol before she gets into position at the lanceboard game with raphael.loadlevel SCL_Main_Aoe debugbook > act 2 set up > teifling pathgo to region > act 2 > haven > bridgego through checkpoint dialogright after: teleportToMe S_DEN_ThiefHideoutLeader

0.speaker: Mol
0.text: Look, you're welcome and all, but I've gotta chat with bigger fish. Later.
0.context: NodeContext: clearly in a rush and needs to go
